attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As we have more peers and MPs (Labour, Liberal and Tory) speaking in support of disobedience, lack of support and proposing civil disorder if ID cards come into being, this scheme has been proven to be another dead New Labour concept. Whilst unworkable and unbelievable in its Big Brother magnitude, can we really allow our liberties again to be passed over again? After the EU referendum, NHS database spending, Consultants appliaction database can this system be secure and can it work? History proves that ID cards only work in times of war and with 100% support.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
